entry.def: A fir or a fir tree is a tall evergreen tree that has thin needle-like leaves.

means: Facility Installation Review 设备安装检查

means.word_mean: 1. nonresinous wood of a fir tree
2. any of various evergreen trees of the genus Abies; chiefly of upland areas

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably from Old Norse fyri- (recorded in fyriskógr 'fir wood')
